The [[tailed beast]] or transformed [[jinchūriki]] fires multiple uncompressed Tailed Beast Balls in rapid succession at the target.

== Trivia ==
* This technique appeared for the first time on a smaller scale, unnamed, in an anime-exclusive sequence in ''[[Naruto: Shippūden]]'' [[Chibaku Tensei (episode)|episode 167]] against [[Pain]].
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]'', Kurama uses this technique by firing several Tailed Beast Balls upwards, which then fall down on its opponents.
